//The Warper to Mall

prontera.gat,159,190,4	script	Mall Warper	902,{
	shop:	warp "quiz_02.gat" ,337,74;
}	

//The Exit to Prontera

quiz_02.gat,335,74,5	script	Exit Mall	902,{
	warp "prontera.gat" ,156,190;
                OnInit:
                waitingroom "Mall Exit",0;
                end;
}
